name: Home and Hearth
uniques: [+1 Food, +1 Production, +1 Gold, +1 Happiness, +1 Faith, +1 Science, +1 Culture] from every [Bomb Shelter]
[+1 Food, +1 Production, +1 Gold, +1 Happiness, +1 Faith, +1 Science, +1 Culture] from every [Bomb Shelter] <in cities with at least [5] [Population]>

name: Public Prayer
uniques: [+1 Faith, +1 Culture] from every [Town Hall] <in cities with at least [3] [Followers of this Religion]>

name: Funeral Rites
uniques: [+25 Faith, +25 Culture] whenever a Great Person is expended

name: Thought Control
uniques: [Censor] units built [in all cities] can [Remove Foreign religions from your own cities] [1] extra times
